You're heading towards the mountains. The cold snow feels nice...
Over there's the desert! The obelisks give a cool, ancient touch to the place!
This way to Neo New Ville! Check out the CERN, it's a cool building!
We should stop extracting oil in the sea; Just look at the water...
Electric cars would be a nice change around here.
I learnt so much about SDGs in the SDG tab, you should take a look too!
If you ever feel lost, just open up your Quest Log!
The city would be so much better off with a new electricity wiring system...
Fruits aren't just tasty: Transform them and you'll see how useful they can get!
You shouldn't put entire companies in danger just to help others...
The more intel you gather, the better you understand what needs to be done!
Check out the signs all over town for extra info!
Welcome! All inhabitants of the planet will be happy to share their knowledge with you!
Economy, forest levels, pollution levels and citizen mood are all connected!
Try to upgrade everything at the same time: Don't let economy crush the planet's health!
You can check how the planet's doing at any time by zooming out.
You'll need to use all 3 of your characters together to solve problems!
Gather useful information with the help of the NGOs!
Transform Items with the Entrepreneur character's abilities, and give them to who needs'em!
The government character can balance out funding between infrastructures!
If you ever feel lost, just open up your Quest Log! Also, go check out the Coal Power Plant.
This town needs some greenery! Like fruits, or something...
Nothing like a good walk in the park! Head east to reach the mountains.
Check out the signs all over town for extra info!
We must find a way to create renewable energy to safeguard the forest.
Such dirty water... Gives me shivers all over...
Over there is Hillside, the montainous hotspot!
Neo New Ville's just South of here!
I learnt so much about SDGs in the SDG tab, you should take a look too!
If you ever feel lost, just open up your Quest Log!
You shouldn't put entire companies in danger just to help others...
You can know how a city is doing economically just by looking at the streets and citizens
You can check how the planet's doing at any time by zooming out.
Check out the signs all over town for extra info!
